spanishExample: Me juraste que esto no pasaría otra vez.
englishTranslation: You swore to me this wouldn’t happen again.

spanishExample: Le tienes que jurar que vas a ganar mucho dinero.
englishTranslation: You have to swear to her that you’re going to earn a lot of money.

spanishExample: No te ha jurado eso.
englishTranslation: He hasn’t sworn that to you.

spanishExample: Él jura que puedo decírselo, para que yo desee algo nuevo.
englishTranslation: He swears I can tell it to him, in order that I wish for something new.

spanishExample: Deseamos que ese sitio tenga una acera.
englishTranslation: We wish for that site to have a sidewalk.

spanishExample: Juramos que esa es la entrada del edificio.
englishTranslation: We swear that’s the entrance to the building.

spanishExample: Te juro que tienes que ir al segundo piso.
englishTranslation: I swear to you that you have to go to the second floor.

spanishExample: Juran que esto funciona.
englishTranslation: They swear this works.

spanishExample: Si vas en esa dirección, encontrarás el puente.
englishTranslation: If you go in that direction, you’ll find the bridge.

spanishExample: ¿Juras que esto va a ser interesante?
englishTranslation: Do you swear this is going to be interesting?

spanishExample: Me juró que la comida aquí es excelente.
englishTranslation: He swore to me that the food here is excellent.

spanishExample: Estoy deseando llegar a la salida.
englishTranslation: I’m wishing to get to the exit.

spanishExample: Desean tenerlo, así que tienes que dárselo.
englishTranslation: They wish to have it, so you have to give it to them.

spanishExample: Desearía estar en la carretera ahora mismo.
englishTranslation: I would wish to be on the road right now.

spanishExample: Desea tenerlo, así que dáselo.
englishTranslation: He wishes to have it, so give it to him.

spanishExample: Juramos que ese estado no es un lugar raro.
englishTranslation: We swear that that state isn’t a weird place.

spanishExample: Bienvenido; puedes usar todo en la casa.
englishTranslation: Welcome(m); you can use everything in the house.

spanishExample: Deseamos poder decírtelo.
englishTranslation: We wished to be able to tell it to you.

spanishExample: Dígamelo, deseo saberlo.
englishTranslation: (Formal) Tell it to me, I wish to know it.

spanishExample: Deseaba conseguir más dinero.
englishTranslation: She wished to get more money.

spanishExample: Juraron que no podían decírnoslo.
englishTranslation: They swore they couldn’t tell it to us.

spanishExample: ¿Deseas ir al parque?
englishTranslation: Do you wish to go to the park?

spanishExample: Juré que lo tendría, así que dámelo.
englishTranslation: I swore I’d have it, so give it to me.

spanishExample: Dámela, eso es lo que él deseaba.
englishTranslation: Give it(f) to me, that’s what he wished.

spanishExample: Dímelo, he deseado saberlo por mucho tiempo.
englishTranslation: Tell it to me, I have wished to know it for a long time.

spanishExample: Desearía pagar mi casa, pero es imposible.
englishTranslation: I would wish to pay for my house, but it’s impossible.

spanishExample: Si no vas a decírmelo, díselo a él.
englishTranslation: If you aren’t going to tell it to me, tell it to him.
